Does HAPI support querying components? https://fhirtest.uhn.ca/baseDstu2/Observation?component-code-component-value-quantity=http://loinc.org|8480-6$60 seems to be finding the code in one component and the value in another (searching code-value-quantity does the same)?

Also, shouldn't the parameter be component-code-value-quantity (this fails with an unknown search parameter error)?

Hmm... yes, I'd say these are both bugs. :)

Would you mind to file a bug report?
Thanks @James Agnew - I opened issue #555. Also, I found an earlier issue (#272) around the parameter naming bug and referenced it.
